biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.cache

Interface SourceModificationDateCache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FullCacheAdapter, FullCacheImpl

    public interface SourceModificationDateCache
    Responsible for storing source files modification dates.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Date getSourceModificationDate(LessSource source)
      Returns a modification date of the LessSource.
      boolean hasSourceModificationDate(LessSource source)
      Tests whether cache contains modification date for the LessSource.
      void saveSourceModificationDate(LessSource source, Date modificationDate)
      Saves a modification date of a LessSource.

    • Method Detail

        Saves a modification date of a LessSource.

        modificationDate - the modification date.

      • hasSourceModificationDate

        boolean hasSourceModificationDate(LessSource source)
        Tests whether cache contains modification date for the LessSource.
        Parameters:
        source - the LessSource.
        Returns:
        true whether cache contains modification date, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0
